00021 /* Macros for analysing parameters. */
00022 #define SET_BITMAP_PARAM( api_cfg, p_init_info, _field )      \
00023     switch( (p_init_info)->behaviors._field ){                \
00024       case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :                            \
00025         /* force the value in any case */                     \
00026         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;   \
00027         break;                                                \
00028       case FSAL_INIT_MAX_LIMIT :                              \
00029         /* remove the flags not specified by user (AND) */    \
00030         api_cfg._field &= (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;  \
00031         break;                                                \
00032       case FSAL_INIT_MIN_LIMIT :                              \
00033         /* add the flags specified by user (OR) */            \
00034         api_cfg._field |= (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;  \
00035         break;                                                \
00036     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */      \
00037     }                                                         \
00038 
00039 
00040 #define SET_INTEGER_PARAM( api_cfg, p_init_info, _field )         \
00041     switch( (p_init_info)->behaviors._field ){                    \
00042     case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :                                  \
00043         /* force the value in any case */                         \
00044         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field;       \
00045         break;                                                \
00046     case FSAL_INIT_MAX_LIMIT :                                    \
00047       /* check the higher limit */                                \
00048       if ( api_cfg._field > (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field )   \
00049         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field ;      \
00050         break;                                                \
00051     case FSAL_INIT_MIN_LIMIT :                                    \
00052       /* check the lower limit */                                 \
00053       if ( api_cfg._field < (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field )   \
00054         api_cfg._field = (p_init_info)->hpss_config._field ;      \
00055         break;                                                \
00056     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */          \
00057     }                                                             \
00058 
00059   
00060 #define SET_STRING_PARAM( api_cfg, p_init_info, _field )          \
00061     switch( (p_init_info)->behaviors._field ){                    \
00062     case FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE :                                  \
00063       /* force the value in any case */                           \
00064       strcpy(api_cfg._field,(p_init_info)->hpss_config._field);   \
00065       break;                                                \
00066     /* In the other cases, we keep the default value. */          \
00067     }                                                             \

00069 
00091 fsal_status_t  FSAL_Init(
00092     fsal_parameter_t        * init_info         /* IN */
00093 ){
00094   
00095   fsal_status_t status;
00096   int rc;
00097               
00098   /* sanity check.  */
00099   if (!init_info)
00100     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_Init);
00101 
00102   /* Check for very important args */
00103 
00104   if ( init_info->fsal_info.log_outputs.liste_voies == NULL )
00105   {
00106     /* issue a warning on stderr */
00107     DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: No logging file specified for FileSystem Abstraction Layer.");
00108   }
00109 
00110   /* proceeds FSAL internal initialization */
00111   
00112   status = fsal_internal_init_global( &(init_info->fsal_info),
00113                                       &(init_info->fs_common_info),
00114                                       &(init_info->fs_specific_info));  
00115   
00116   if (FSAL_IS_ERROR(status)) Return(status.major,status.minor,INDEX_FSAL_Init);
00117 
00118   /* FS Specific initialization. */
00119 
00120   /* Define the password file path used by PostgreSQL */
00121 #if defined(_USE_PGSQL)
00122   if (! init_info->fs_specific_info.dbparams.passwdfile[0] == '\0') {
00123     rc = setenv("PGPASSFILE", init_info->fs_specific_info.dbparams.passwdfile, 1);
00124     if (rc != 0)
00125       DisplayLog("FSAL INIT: *** WARNING: Could not set POSTGRESQL keytab path.");
00126   }
00127 #elif defined (_USE_MYSQL)
00128   my_init();
00129 #endif
00130     
00131   Return(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR,0,INDEX_FSAL_Init);  
00132   
00133 }
